oracle.iam.identity.dbs.integration.openfire

Interface Database.ICF.Resource

  • Enclosing interface:
    Database.ICF

    public static interface Database.ICF.Resource

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONNECTION_RETRY_COUNT
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specifiy the number of consecutive attempts to be made at establishing a connection with the target system.
      static java.lang.String CONNECTION_RETRY_INTERVAL
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specifiy the interval (in milliseconds) between consecutive attempts at establishing a connection with the target system.
      static java.lang.String CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specifiy the time (in milliseconds) within which the target system is expected to respond to a connection attempt.
      static java.lang.String DATABASE_DRIVER
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify depending on the Database Server that you are using the JDBC driver class.
      static java.lang.String DATABASE_NAME
      Attribute tag which may be defined on an IT Resource to specify the name of the database as specified in the SERVER_HOST and SERVER_PORT parameter.
      static java.lang.String DATABASE_SCHEMA
      Attribute tag which may be defined on an IT Resource to specify the cataloge schema name to be used.
      static java.lang.String LOCALE_COUNTRY
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to hold the name of language region the server is using.
      static java.lang.String LOCALE_LANGUAGE
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to hold the name of language the server is using.
      static java.lang.String LOCALE_TIMEZONE
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to hold the name of time zone the server is using.
      static java.lang.String PRINCIPAL_NAME
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify the user name of the target system account to be used to establish a connection.
      static java.lang.String PRINCIPAL_PASSWORD
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify the password of the target system account specified by the #PRINCIPAL_NAME parameter.
      static java.lang.String RESPONSE_TIMEOUT
      Attribute tag which may be defined on a IT Resource to specify the timeout period the Service Provider consumer doesn't get a HTTP response.
      static java.lang.String SECURE_SOCKET
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify if you plan to configure SSL to secure communication between Identity Manager and the target system.
      static java.lang.String SERVER_HOST
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify the host name for the target system database.
      static java.lang.String SERVER_PORT
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify the listener port for the target system database.
      static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
      Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify the password of the target system account specified by the #PRINCIPAL_NAME parameter.

    • Field Detail

      • SERVER_HOST

        static final java.lang.String SERVER_HOST
        Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify the host name for the target system database.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER_PORT

        static final java.lang.String SERVER_PORT
        Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify the listener port for the target system database.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DATABASE_DRIVER

        static final java.lang.String DATABASE_DRIVER
        Attribute tag which must be defined on an IT Resource to specify depending on the Database Server that you are using the JDBC driver class.

        Enter one of the following values as the JDBC driver class name: 

          +----------------------+----------------------------------------------+
  | Database Type        | Driver Class Name                            |
  +----------------------+----------------------------------------------+
  | Oracle Database      | oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver                     |
  |                      | oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver              |
  | Microsoft SQL Server | com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver |
  | MySQL                | com.mysql.jdbc.Driver                        |
  | Sybase               | com.sybase.jdbc2.jdbc.SybDriver              |
  |                      | com.sybase.jdbc3.jdbc.SybDriver              |
  | IBM DB2 UDB          | com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver                    |
  +----------------------+----------------------------------------------+
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RESPONSE_TIMEOUT

        static final java.lang.String RESPONSE_TIMEOUT
        Attribute tag which may be defined on a IT Resource to specify the timeout period the Service Provider consumer doesn't get a HTTP response.

        If this property has not been specified, the default is to wait for the response until it is received.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
